title.narrative: Supported the Nigerian Immigration Service to develop a Career Progression Framework, creating linkages between staff performance and career advancement, defining job roles based on their complexity and the competencies required to undertake work at various levels.

description.narrative: Career Progression Framework developed at the Nigeria Immigration Service Clearly defined schemes of service and job specifications with clear delineation of duties and responsibilities at all levels of the Nigeria Immigration Service is developed, within the career progression framework to allow officers in each cadre of service to manage and shape their individual careers, while improving job performance.  Curriculum of mandatory and optional courses developed, in response to the new career management tools - job competences, job descriptions, recruitment criteria, and emerging migration issues that are of relevance to the Nigeria Immigration Service.  New Career Progression Framework, schemes of service, and course curricula developed by the Nigeria Immigration Service launched.
